200.description: Get any message by its ID

timestamp.description: Unix ms when sent or received.

schema.description: Recipient's iMessage address. Must be in E.164 format.

parameters.description: Recipient's iMessage address. Must be in E.164 format.
parameters.name: to

schema.description: Leased iMessage number that has been used to send messages to the recipient. Must be in E.164 format.

parameters.description: Leased iMessage number that has been used to send messages to the recipient. Must be in E.164 format.
parameters.name: from

schema.description: Limit of how many messages to return, default is 20. Should never exceed 200.

parameters.description: Limit of how many messages to return, default is 20. Should never exceed 200.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Get iMessage conversation history for a thread

to.description: Recipient's iMessage address. Must be in E.164 format.

from.description: Leased iMessage number that has been used to send messages to the recipient. Must be in E.164 format.

status.description: Status of the delivery (delivered, failed, delayed).

auto_reported_as_spam.description: Whether the message was automatically labeled as spam by Apple.

marked_as_spam.description: Whether the message was marked as spam by the user.

from.description: Leased iMessage number that has been used to send the reaction. Must be in E.164 format.

filtered.description: Whether the conversation was filtered by Apple.

chat_marked_as_spam.description: Whether the chat was automatically labeled as spam by Apple.

total.description: Total number of messages in the conversation.

schema.description: Other party's phone number. Must be in E.164 format.

parameters.description: Other party's phone number. Must be in E.164 format.
parameters.name: to

schema.description: Your leased number used in this thread. Must be in E.164 format.

parameters.description: Your leased number used in this thread. Must be in E.164 format.
parameters.name: from

schema.description: Limit of how many messages to return, default is 20. Should never exceed 200.

parameters.description: Limit of how many messages to return, default is 20. Should never exceed 200.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Get SMS/MMS conversation history for a thread. Queries your sent messages and incoming webhook events only.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the message was sent or received (Unix ms).
Timestamp when the message was delivered (Unix ms).

reaction.description: Reaction type (e.g. love, thumbsup, thumbsdown, haha, emphasized, questioned).

on.description: Message content that was reacted to.

action.description: Whether the reaction was added or removed.

from.description: Phone number that sent the reaction (E.164).

total.description: Number of messages in this response.
